item.description:
Jameson & Company – Free Grants & Contracts Webinar - “Indirect Rates & How to Avoid Common Mistakes on the Cost Portion of your Proposal”
When: January 19th at 2:30 pm
Where: Via WebEx (https://jamesoncpa.we... )
Register: http://www.jamesoncpa...
The government will fund all “reasonable” requests for indirect costs. Too often, small businesses spend hundreds of hours on the technical section of their SBIR/Grant proposal while ignoring critical aspects of the cost portion. In this strategy-packed, open-forum webinar, you’ll learn best practices, tips, and techniques honed over 30 years by our firm, to help you understand the inner workings of DCAA and DFAS. Ed Jameson, CEO of Jameson & Company CPAs, will host the 1 hour webinar in an Open-Forum format (Space is limited). To inquire about the webinar or any questions, contact Tom Pistone at tom@jamesoncpa.com or call at 781-862-5170.
item.name: Indirect Rates & How to Avoid Common Mistakes on the Cost Portion of your Propos
